alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 05 at 3:55PM CDT until September 05 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Eastern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 655 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... North Little Rock, Sherwood, Maumelle, North Little Rock Airport, Vilonia, Enola, Mount Vernon, Olmstead, Gibson, Marche, Sylvan Hills, Morgan, Camp Robinson, Holland, Barney, Otto, Hamlet, Saltillo and Cato. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
